name: Crystal Cavern (fsb3rke)
description:
Controls:

PC:

W : Forward;

A : Right;

D : Left;

S : Backward;

R : Restart Level

ESC : Main Menu

Xbox:

Gamepad Left Thumbstick +Y: Forward

Gamepad Left Thumbstick -Y: Backward

Gamepad Left Thumbstick +X: Right

Gamepad Left Thumbstick -X: Left

Gamepad Face Button Top: Restart

Gamepad Face Button Right: Main Menu

//////////////////////

What is your goal:

Collect all collectibles/crystals and go to white light

//////////////////////

Version: 1.3
